title: inda vEDam
sahitya:
inda vEDam kaNDu EmArEn IshanE undan iNaiyaDigaL oru kaNamum viDEnE


anupallavi

  sundarat-tirumEni shuDalaip-poDiyaip-pUshikkandaram viDam tAngik-karam tanil OduvAngum


caraNam    puliyuraiyADai koNDum bhuyangamaNindu koNDum kalaimuri shUDik-koNDum kaDavuL nI varakkaNDu 
ayarndiDEn aranE arudiyilinbam ellAm payandiDum poruL nIyE parApari bhAgam koNDOi
